[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@fgv/ts-res](./ts-res.md) &gt; [QualifierTypes](./ts-res.qualifiertypes.md) &gt; [TerritoryQualifierType](./ts-res.qualifiertypes.territoryqualifiertype.md)

## QualifierTypes.TerritoryQualifierType class

Qualifier type for territory values. Territories are two-letter ISO-3166-2 Alpha-2 country codes. Canonical territory codes are uppercase, but this implementation handles incorrect casing.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class TerritoryQualifierType extends QualifierType 
```
**Extends:** [QualifierType](./ts-res.qualifiertypes.qualifiertype.md)
